text: Laurence Fishburne net worth : Laurence Fishburne is an American actor, director, producer and playwright who has a net worth of $ 20 million. Laurence Fishburne has earned his net worth through his many acting roles in a career that dates back more than 40 years. His most notable films include, What's Love Got to do With it, Boyz in the Hood, Mission Impossible III, and of course The Matrix I, II and III. He has also starred in several television series such as, CSI Miami, CSI New York, The Equalizer, Spenser for Hire and many more. Fishburne is also the voice of Morpheus on the video games, Enter the Matrix and The Matrix Online, as well as the voice of Dr. Raymond Langston on the games, CSI : Deadly Intent
